segments.text: Why don ’ t we go the cinema tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good but I don ’ t know what ’ s on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think there ’ s a very romantic new film starring Hugh Grant . Let ’ s go and see that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , that ’ s a good idea . Where shall we meet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well how about meeting at my place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . I ’ ll call you once I arrive .
segments.speaker: S2
